name: gm2-wordpress-suite
description: This repository contains the development version of the Gm2 WordPress Suite plugin. For plugin installation steps and feature documentation see [readme.txt](readme.txt).

scripts.prebuild:assets: rm -f assets/dist/ae-main.modern*.js assets/dist/ae-main.legacy*.js assets/dist/contact*.js assets/dist/product*.js assets/dist/blog*.js assets/dist/polyfills*.js assets/dist/ae-lazy*.js assets/dist/vanilla-helpers*.js && rm -rf assets/dist/modules && rm -f assets/build/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run build:optimizer && npm run build:assets
